languages.text: {n}Маражай хмыкает.{/n} "Я ведь должен выразить свою благодарность за то, что мы бежали с арены. Как еще я могу это сделать, не разделив с тобой то, что по настоящему волнует меня?"
{n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай хмыкает.{/n} "Я ведь должен выразить свою благодарность за то, что мы бежали с арены. Как еще я могу это сделать, не разделив с тобой то, что по настоящему волнует меня?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋喉中发出了低沉的嗡嗡声。{/n}“既然我已经逃出了竞技场，我自然应该好好表达我的感激之情。我希望与你分享真正令我兴奋的东西，还有什么比这更合适的做法呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋喉中发出了低沉的嗡嗡声。{/n}“既然我已经逃出了竞技场，我自然应该好好表达我的感激之情。我希望与你分享真正令我兴奋的东西，还有什么比这更合适的做法呢？”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、喉の奥でブツブツ話す。{/n}「ま、闘技場から脱出できたお礼をしないとな。俺が本当に興奮することを共に感じるのが最高の礼だろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、喉の奥でブツブツ話す。{/n}「ま、闘技場から脱出できたお礼をしないとな。俺が本当に興奮することを共に感じるのが最高の礼だろ？」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai emite un sonido gutural.{/n} «Supongo que debería expresar mi agradecimiento por ayudarme a escapar de la arena. ¿Y qué mejor modo de hacerlo que compartiendo contigo lo que me apasiona verdaderamente?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai emite un sonido gutural.{/n} «Supongo que debería expresar mi agradecimiento por ayudarme a escapar de la arena. ¿Y qué mejor modo de hacerlo que compartiendo contigo lo que me apasiona verdaderamente?».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai répond d'une voix sourde :{/n} « Je vous dois des remerciements pour m'avoir aidé à m'évader de l'arène, après tout. Quel meilleur moyen de vous exprimer ma reconnaissance que de vous faire partager ce qui m'excite le plus au monde ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai répond d'une voix sourde :{/n} « Je vous dois des remerciements pour m'avoir aidé à m'évader de l'arène, après tout. Quel meilleur moyen de vous exprimer ma reconnaissance que de vous faire partager ce qui m'excite le plus au monde ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai summt tief in seiner Kehle.{/n} "Ich will wirklich meinen Dank für die Flucht aus der Arena zum Ausdruck bringen. Und was gibt es Besseres, als mit Euch zu teilen, was mich wahrhaft reizt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai summt tief in seiner Kehle.{/n} "Ich will wirklich meinen Dank für die Flucht aus der Arena zum Ausdruck bringen. Und was gibt es Besseres, als mit Euch zu teilen, was mich wahrhaft reizt?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, boğazından çıkan pes bir sesle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Ne de olsa arenadan kaçışım için minnettarlığımı sunmam gerek. Bunun beni gerçekten heyecanlandıran bir şeyi seninle paylaşmamdan daha iyi bir yolu var mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hums low in his throat.{/n} "I ought to express my gratitude for my escape from the arena, after all. What better way than to share with you that which truly excites me?"
